sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const Blog = ({ blog, like, remove, user }) => { console.log(blog) const blogStyle = { paddingTop: 10, paddingLeft: 2, border: 'solid', borderWidth: 1, marginBottom: 5 } const creator = blog.user.username === user.username return (
{blog.title} {blog.author}
{blog.url}
{blog.likes} likes
added by {blog.user.name}
{creator && ()}
) } Blog.propTypes = { blog: PropTypes.object.isRequired, like: PropTypes.func.isRequired, remove: PropTypes.func.isRequired, creator: PropTypes.bool.isRequired } export default Blog
